fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND ( NOT ( ISNULL ( Total_Cost_Agreed__c )) , NOT ( ISNULL ( Total_Amendment_Budget__c )) ), Total_Cost_Agreed__c + Total_Amendment_Budget__c, IF ( AND ( ISNULL ( Total_Cost_Agreed__c ), NOT ( ISNULL ( Total_Cost_Agreed__c )) ), 0 + Total_Amendment_Budget__c, Total_Cost_Agreed__c + 0 ) )
fieldUpdates.name: CV SignOff Updated_4

fieldUpdates.formula: LEFT((IF(Neuro__c, "Neuro; ", "") & IF(All__c , "Agnostic; ", "") & IF(M_M__c , "M&M; ", "") & IF(Ophthal__c , "Ophthal; ", "") & IF(I_O__c , "I/O; ", "")& IF(I_I__c , "I&I; ", "")& IF(SD__c , "SD; ", "")& IF(FSP__c , "FSP; ", "")& IF(RGC_Other__c , "Other; ", "")& IF(CVD_F__c , "CVD/F; ", "")), LEN(IF(Neuro__c, "Neuro; ", "") & IF(All__c , "Agnostic; ", "") & IF(M_M__c , "M&M; ", "") & IF(Ophthal__c , "Ophthal; ", "") & IF(I_O__c , "I/O; ", "")& IF(I_I__c , "I&I; ", "")& IF(SD__c , "SD; ", "")& IF(FSP__c , "FSP; ", "")& IF(RGC_Other__c , "Other; ", "")& IF(CVD_F__c , "CVD/F; ", ""))-2 )
